Welcome! 👋 How does it work? 🤔 Select a style 🎨 Choose a photo 📸 Voilà! 🎉
Thank you for downloading the Fitstyle app!\nHere is a quick tutorial on how the app works and how to use it. Fitstyle is a filter that takes two images, a photo (ideally a full body portrait) and a style image (like a painting), and combines the two to create a unique image. Our filter applies the style\’s look to the background of the photo, keeping the person unfiltered.\n\nThis is done in two simple steps… 👉 Pick from a list of different artworks or upload your own image. From your gallery, choose a photo that you\'d like to style. That\'s all there is to it!\nThe resulting image will be automatically saved in the app and accessible via the \'My Images\' option on the home screen.
